several battles against each other without any real decisive outcome?

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/samuraihistory/polls

It would probably be interesting if people started to get in there and
create some Samurai History opinion polls.

messages.subject: Takeda Shingen or Uesugi Kenshin?
messages.msgSnippet: Hello guys!!!! I have been absent for a loooooong time, hopefully you remember me. I had school, exams...... Since I have time, I want to ask you, who do you
messages.messageBody:
Hello guys!!!! I have been absent for a loooooong time, hopefully you
remember me. I had school, exams......

Since I have time, I want to ask you, who do you prefer?!

Takeda Shingen or Uesugi Kenshin?

Cheers guys!!!
